original_text: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, after the abominations of the heathen, whom the Lord cast out before the children of Israel.
korean_text: 므낫세가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 이방 사람의 가증한 일을 따라서

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 여호와 보시기에 악한 일을 행하였으니

sentences.original_text: after the abominations of the heathen
whom the Lord cast out before the children of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 사람들을 따랐더라
